page.title: 02Sorbie Village
page.content: Sorbie is a small{village}in{ Dumfries and Galloway . It is very peaceful,with a quiet, relaxing{ {lifestyle},which attracts holidaymakers. It is surrounded by scenic hills and landscape views. There are 112 people living in Sorbie.The majority of this{population are over 40 years old.Almost one third of the people are retired. There is one shop and a Post Office in the village.The shop sells tinned food,drinks,crisps,meat and all kinds of groceries.It is a very popular shop and the owners are well liked.The Post Office is also an asset to the village.It sells all kinds of stationery. The "Pheasant Inn" is the only{ {hotel}in Sorbie.The people who own the hotel,work and live in it.They employ 3 workers,and serve good meals.
